mapper.select: select count(1) from scan_record where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_finish = 0
select id, user_id as userId, start_head as startHead, start_num as startNum, end_num as endNum from scan_record where is_finish = #{isFinish,jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT 1
